website_summaries.verdict: Exciting activities, a cool theme, and mid-range price make this water slide perfect for backyard water fun.
pros: Sports a fun, colorful shark design with a climbing area, mini pool, and water cannon
Comes with a blower and inflates in minutes
Can fit 4 kids at once and has a weight capacity of up to 200 pounds
cons: Folding it for storage isn't nearly as simple as setting it up
At least one slide had a shark that wouldn't inflate completely

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this thing! I couldn’t believe my husband bought it for her, but honestly it’s been a great purchase. She plays in for hours, even when it seems way too cold. It inflates quickly, deflates very quickly as well. The air pump is super loud, that is my only complaint so far!
customer_reviews.author: MegsandJC

customer_reviews.title: Great slide
customer_reviews.text: This waterslide is great. Easy to set up and a nice size. My kid loves it and has been using it daily since we got it. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because where you hook up the hose it leaks significantly no matter how precisely we screw the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Mystikstar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow my kids love this thing!! It’s great. Only because problem is it’s very very hard to fold up and put it back
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and easy to take down. I bought it because my grandkids (6 yr old and 3 yr old) we visiting for a couple of weeks. The y ha d a great time playing in the water. After it dried I could still fit it in the carry bag. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We just used this for the first time today and our kids loved it. My daughter is 4 and my son is 3 and they had a blast. The setup is really easy (we put it on a tarp but that is not required). The hardest part about the whole thing is just drying it and putting it away. Ideally you should leave it out in the sun to dry. Only design change I would make would be to add another drainage plug in the pool part. I’d highly recommend this product. I looked at a bunch of other slides before deciding on this one and I’m glad we got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin N

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first because of the price tage, but Im so glad I got it! I have a 7, 6, and 1 year old and they all absolutely love it. Set up is quick and easy, but tear down was a bit trickier. Material is sturdy and its well put together. Blower works great and is quiet. It was shipped and delivered in a very timely matter. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inflatable water park!
customer_reviews.text: We 💕 it! Suitable for older kids too. Easy to setup. I recommend filling up the pool area before connecting the hose to the sprayers to create that “splash” effect. So cool! Hours and hours of fun. Good quality. You will see some bubbles through the seams when the blower is on, which is completely normal, to avoid bursting out of the seams. I bought some rings to play ring toss with the shark fin. You have to get this for the family.
customer_reviews.author: PellGar

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this!! Easy to put up and is very sturdy. Just be sure to follow directions and stake it down!! My kids are 5 and 2 1/2 years old. We’ve had friends over who are up to age 7 and they loved it too. We play for hours!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Endless hours of fun. Have had 4-5 kids on it at once.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Not for 9 years olds
customer_reviews.text: It's much smaller then the picture if your children are 4.5 ft they are too big for this it's for little kids 3 to 7 age way too much money for size
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions and shark fin doesn’t inflate
customer_reviews.text: The kids like this item but I’m not fully pleased with the the quality. There is a blow up fin that would not blow up at all. It was just a balled up piece of fabric in the water area that wasn’t working and it looked weird. Not what I hoped for with the amount of money I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use, inflates within 20 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: This is so worth the money! Our 5yr old daughters play on here all day every day, and have never gotten bored! Even the dog enjoys running through the water when we have it hooked up to the hose. Inflated within 20 seconds, and is easy to deflate and roll up to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, it arrived quickly, i had a concern about the pool portion of the inflatable and the company responded within hours and answered my questions without any issues. Other reviews stated the air blower was loud, i did not have that issue. In fact, i have checked on it a few times making sure it was working its been so quiet. My son absolutely loves it! We've had 5 toddlers playing in, on, and around this without any issues. Its such a well made product :)
customer_reviews.author: Savymom101

customer_reviews.title: Really cool slide and pool area
customer_reviews.text: Since we will not be vacationing this summer, we had to find things to do with the kids (11 and 2). So we came accross this slide and it is amazing. It is about 8 ft and when my daughter went down the slide, it caught everyone off guard of how fast this slide is. She just kept sliding over, over, and over. When my son was spashing in the little pool area at the base (Shark Club). This slide covers both age groups and then at the end of BBQ, I hung out in the Shar Club and played with the kids. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: clifton2000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the package this week, set it up and there you go!!!! My kids having a blast !!! thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mae

customer_reviews.title: Velcro on slide leaves huge scratches
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. I don't know if only mine had this issue, but the Velcro and the stitching left bleeding scratches on my kids bottoms and sides when they slid down. Adjusting the Velcro didn't help at all. Sadly, had to return....
customer_reviews.author: Amy, FL

customer_reviews.title: Dual birthdays slide to fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I ordered this inflatable water-slide for our grandchildren. Their birthdays are only 4 days apart and they are 5 and 3, this slide was the hit of the party. It was at the center of the party and we got so many wonderful comments on how fun and gorgeous it was. Thank you for making our grandchildren's birthday so much fun and memorable. We will be honored to recommend your company to our friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Brown

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got it today, set up was really quick and easy. So far it seems really sturdy and my kids ages 13-4 LOVE it and have been very rough and it’s holding up really well. They e been playing for hours, having the best time ever!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mo

customer_reviews.title: Cuts and grass stains!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's an okay slide. Smaller than expected but there's two major cons: 1. There's a blue tarp/sheet over the slide for some reason, maybe to increase the slipperyness but the edges aren't sealed down at all so every time my kids go down the edges give them paper cuts. 2. The curve of the slide is severe enough that it flings my kids against the slide. Normally not a problem but the sides aren't high enough so my kids fly right over the edge and end up in the grass. For $500 I'd expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great slide and great company.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Absolutely value for money! Very sturdy and well built! It’s a great size too. I am 130lb 5’6” and I had no problem climbing up it and sliding down and it was great fun. It keeps a perfect amount of water in the bottom area for toddlers to play in. It came very quick! Quicker than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Salad

customer_reviews.title: This has saved our summer!
customer_reviews.text: With summer camp canceled this year, we decided to splurge on something fun for the kids. They've used this every single day and it is always the highlight of their day. We surprised them with it and the look of joy on their faces when they saw it for the first time is a memory I will always cherish. One of the best purchases I've ever made for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: The coolest!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We've used it a few times already this summer for a rambunctious 6 and 4 year old (they are not gentle or slow moving) and it has been a huge hit, and we haven't seen any signs of wear and tear yet. The fan and sprayers work great, it's colorful, a great size, I can't imagine what else you'd want. It's so great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids LOVE this water slide!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW-this thing is awesome! We bought this for our grandkids and couldn't be more pleased. The material is super thick and durable, with an extra layer of material on the slide itself. Five of our grandkids, ranging from eleven to three have spent hours sliding, climbing and hiding in the little open space under the slide in order scare their siblings and cousins as they run by to slide down again. Set up is very quick and easy and taking it down is not as bad as I thought it might have been. A major win for these grandparents!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: retmar13

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my backyard and my kids love it! Already used it twice. Only thing i don't like is how much water splashes out when the boys go down the slide. Other than that it is a perfect little investment. I bought a tarp to put it on as well for added protection. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Fred DLR

customer_reviews.title: Fun slide for kids
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - inflates very quickly - easy setup - good size for kids under 7 CONS: - getting the water out and drying it totally is A LOT of work and takes a while, since the water gets inside the fabric. - the price has gone down by $100 and of course I bought it at the highest point. I wish the price had remained stable.
customer_reviews.author: Aurélien

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Much detail put into the manufacturing. My 7 year old had tons of fun playing on this. The directions kind of suck, but after figuring it out it only took 10-15 minutes ti get it up and running. Drying it out kind of a pain and hard to fold back up, but who really cares about that when your child has so much fun and joy while playing on it! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun for kids of different ages
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect way to get the kids out of the house. I live in Texas and it’s unbelievably hot in the summers, not to mention the humidity factors. My 2 & 4 year old girls absolutely love this thing. Let me clarify something to everybody. A lot of folks on here complain about 2 things; the motor being too loud and it being difficult to store the slide after use. They couldn’t be more wrong in both counts. So easy to pack up. I think it took me 5-10 min to fold and store the first time we used it. Also the motor is very quiet. So don’t pay attention to those reviews that say otherwise. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A great backyard investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, the kids were playing on it inside of 20 minutes from opening the box! They love it, I love it, it was worth every dollar. Three boys, ages 10, 8, and 3 played for hours with no issue of deflation, tipping, or collapsing. I wish I had thought of it sooner, since all the pools and water parks have been closed for Covid-19. Deflating it afterwards and draining it are no problem, takes less than a minute to set up, as well as take down.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Harding

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Its great! Used it for my Grand Daughters birthday party and eveyone had lots of fun. The only thing is that I don't think its as easy as it looks to roll up and store as it shows on the video but over all qualithy makes up for that. I'm really happy with the durability of the product. I'm happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: cbrineman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This came to us in less than a week from when I ordered! It came in the box that was in great shape and not damaged at all! It has the blower, stakes, and storage bag that come with it. We are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephk1

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how well made this seems. Kids played for 3 hours straight. This went up pretty easy. Directions are a bit unclear just make sure you have the hoses in the right spots because its a pain to undo all the straps and switch them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Waterslide
customer_reviews.text: Wait until 8/1 before you buy.... otherwise you will be like me paying over $100 too much. As for the slide it is sturdy and fun for kids under 5.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Winke

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the ones you rent so consider the price for it being significantly smaller.
customer_reviews.text: It came after my son’s 6th birthday! I wanted to send it back the moment it arrived but my husband rescued it from my thoughts of return. I was looking for it to be a lot bigger. I read the dimensions but I can’t imagine what the dimensions would look like without it seeing it. Smh I know now. It just simply wasn’t as big as the pictures make it look.
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: I got some quality for my money at least.
customer_reviews.text: I did get some quality for my money. When I unboxed it I seen all the hoses and such and was worried about setup but once I inflated it and unwound the hoses it was so easy to figure out. I like that the waterlines were perfect length and tucked nice and tight to the sides. This waterslide is great, our family has had so much fun on it. I’m about 185lbs and I run up it and slide down it all the time. It’s really stable as long as you stake it down nice and tight. It was really expensive but if you can do it, you’ll be happy with a bit of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made for the summer. The kids love it. It provides hours of fun, and best of all, it drains the energy out of my kids so I don't have to. It is well built, and even supports an adult to go on the slide. The blower is not too loud, my kids are louder than the blower.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service. I had a small issue with one of the blow ups and after contacting customer service they quickly shipped me a replacement. Buyers Feel confident when making a purchase with this company. I will be a repeat customer from now on. Very happy!!!! Thanks again. Helping my child stay cool in this Texas summer heat!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and her friends love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The slide is so much fun for my 4 year old daughter and her friends. I debated for a while about getting it. But, it’s totally worth it!! It’s not huge but, big enough to hopefully last her until she’s eight. No more paying $300 to rent a bounce house on her birthdays. She has her own that she can use over, and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bawuah

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy set up, super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Grandma days rule! Super fast set up and take down make it easy to let the grandkids exercise in the backyard while our travel activities are limited. Very happy with this purchase! They love it! Ages 2, and 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived pretty fast, and met our expectations. It’s brought my little boy so much happiness during these crazy times. He wants to use it everyday! It comes with a blower (score!), and a storage bag. I told myself there was no way I’d get the slide into the bag BUT IT FITS! Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: K Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We just received our water slide & the kids had a blast.. Extremely easy to set up. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Love this! I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE it! Easy to inflate. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Cobie Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! My 4 and 6 year old played for 4 hours today. I was nervous about how loud and obnoxious the blower would be, but it was surprisingly quiet. It was easy and quick to set up, and seems pretty sturdy. Definitely worth the money, especially during this pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome summer toy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and surprisingly way quieter than I thought it would be. My kids absolutely loved it for birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: JBenn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a covid summer!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! awesome purchase perfect for a 5 year olds birthday party. Perfect for a city Chicago yard Fun for hours !
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Last only 3 use and after motor stop working very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After the 3rd use the motor stop working Very disappointed Don’t buy this product Very nice looking and kids love it The seller Needs to work on a better motor. No motor no fun.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Scaglione

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing company, product, and customer service! Easy to take down and put up! The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could have been better
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to grow mildew no matter how long I let it dry .. I have left it up in the sun for 2 days and wiped it dry and put it away in bag took it out and it was covered in mildew . The customer support team was helpful and walked me through steps to ensure it does not happen again.
customer_reviews.author: jamie nickel

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun at home
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely love this slide! Hours of entertainment right in our own backyard. It seems very durable. It’s bright and colorful too.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worth it!!!! Best thing we've bought all Summer. The kids absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great slide, drying is difficult.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in great condition, was very easy to set up. It’s great for my two kids (both under 50 lbs). Would hold an adult for a gentle slide, but I’d easily knock it over or deflate it if I played on it like they do. The hardest part is trying to dry it off before putting it away so it doesn’t get gross.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: We have used it twice so far. My son loves it and setup is easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Karthiga Priya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After searching high and low and reading many, many reviews, we found this gem and absolutely love it! It’s a great size and well made. I was slightly concerned it wouldn’t be sturdy enough for our oldest who is 10, but it definitely is. She had 6 friends over and they all used it for hours and loved it. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D

customer_reviews.title: Great water slide!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of Fun!!! My son loved it... so did his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Juniorwbusa

customer_reviews.title: Great slide! Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This slide has been PERFECT for our twin toddlers and 11 year old daughter during this hot summer here in AZ.
customer_reviews.author: buffybot

customer_reviews.title: Love this Inflatable Waterslide
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the birthday of our three grandchildren, ages 7,5, and 2. They loved playing on it for hours! It was a big hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy house is great. Super easy to inflate and attach the hose and the customer service was great! When the product first arrived our hose was damaged and had a leak. They sent us a new hose in a timely manner. Definitely recommend this product! The kids love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Delighted Grandkids and Grandparents
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids ages 2-11 had a blast with this amazing shark slide. Hours and hours of fun. Don't hesitate it will be sold out again. I watch for weeks before I actually snagged one and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: BHanson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids. They love it. Easy to set up and take down. I put mine down on a plastic tarp to keep it clean. Be sure to thoroughly dry or you'll get mold. I set mine up in the garage to dry for a day.
customer_reviews.author: DanDog

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product our grandkids love the slide and it’s great at the end for the baby to sit and play in a small pool area, love it thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase!! Instantly creating amazing moments and memories. Well built, strong and durable, incredibly easy to set up and so much fun!! Using it dry for now until the weather gets warm enough to fill with water ;)
customer_reviews.author: ashley seidl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: In picture looks way bigger, but my kids really enjoy it. Perfect for summer days.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: A very entertainment bounce house, my kids love it, the combination for wet and dry is a bonus. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Cesar A Bojorge

customer_reviews.title: Family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know who loves it more my 2 year old grandson or his dad. 🥰 hours and hours of fun. So pleased with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Amy Langley

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter’s birthday party. Opened it the day of the party to find it smaller than expected and the blower did not work. Had to find a last minute rental and had to pay extra for the same day rental and delivery
customer_reviews.author: whitney kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great summer fun! Blows up easily and deflates quickly. So far it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: CKW

customer_reviews.title: This a must have for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: WOW...JUST WOW this thing is amazing well put together easy setup my grand sons(and the neighborhood kids) LOVE IT and the adults...jealous as we are..have a blast watching them.I highly recommend this product...COULD NOT BE HAPPIER
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and all summer long fun! if properly taken care of it should last us many years of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Morris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! Our kids are 8, 4 & 2 years old. Perfect for their size & ages. They are having a blast! Easy to assemble & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much fun for my kids... they play hours and hours on this without getting bored...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves it!! Especially my daughter. She’s having a blast!! So glad I purchased!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Boys love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Order the item early and did not open until the day of the party. My boys love it. Very easy to set up. Will follow up after a couple use of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My son loves it. Easy to assemble but kind of heavy for only one person to put away. The material is sturdy and durable and inflates in less than 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Sturdy, heavy duty and easy to setup
customer_reviews.author: Brandon VanBaggen

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 product & gr8 customer service
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 product and excellent customer service. Kids will have lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My kids 12 and 9 have had a blast! Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ocassional reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Hardy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just used the water slide this past weekend. My grandkids and neighbor kids had a fantastic time. Ages ranged from 2-8. Set up and packing up was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are 4 and 3 years old and absolutely love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love this water slide. They are on it for hours. Super easy to set up and store. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Sczepanski

product_meta.title: ACTION AIR Inflatable Waterslide, Shark Bounce House with Slide for Wet and Dry, Playground Sets for Backyards, Water Gun & Splash Pool, Durable Sewn with Extra Thick Material, Idea for Kids (9417N)
feature_bullets: [CUSTOMER SATISFACTION]: Top one qualify manufactory for indoor/outdoor bounce house, Designed by Action Air in America. Action Air is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. All of our bounce house qualify for a 3 month warranty, our service team will provide premium service to help solve any problem.

[WE CARE YOUR CHILDREN]: This bouncer is approved with a CPC (Children Product Certificate) and has satisfied CPSC tests. Please Note that air leak from all the seams is necessary because the product is inflated by constant air flow and this leakage is required to stop the product becoming over-inflated.

[EXTRA THICK WITH LARGE JUMPING AREA]: The kids bounce house with durable Sewn and extra thick jumping and slidingh area to give 100% protection to your children. Inflated size 15'L×11'W×8'H(ft). The bouncy castle can easily fit 4 children at one time with a maximum weight of 200 pounds.

[GREAT FUN FOR YOUR CHILDREN]: This water play house with blower give so much fun to your children with sliding, climbing, water gun and splash pool. A great water park for your children during summer holiday and fun slide to winter. This bouncy castle is perfect for gifts and holidays. A great gift for your children any time of the year. Perfect for birthday gifts, Christmas gifts or to keep little ones busy in summer. The Action Air Bouncer will delight all children!

[FAST SET-UP IN 3 MINS AND EAST TO STORAGE]: Set-up and take down is easily done in under 3 minutes. This jumping castle is portable and perfect for the park, garage, backyard, etc. This inflatable bouncer includes the bouncer, air blower, water tube, repair patches, lawn stakes and a portable carrying bag. Easy to use and carry!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars240 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
